about.heading: A cinematic lab for alternate history that fuses storytelling with data.
about.description_1: Trace ripples from one decision to tectonic shifts across continents. Every chapter offers a carefully researched baseline, then splinters into ten plausible what-ifs that you can explore, compare, and remix.
about.description_2: We pair historian-reviewed narratives with interactive charts, giving you both the poetry and the provenance of each timeline.
